item.title: Two Streetlights not working., 12th January
item.description:
Streetlights B99- 1 & B99-2 had previously been on 24 hours a day for some weeks. Not they are off 24 hours a day since last night. Since there are only 3 streetlights in the close it is very dark. This is therefore urgent. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bidborough Close, Hayes, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light on foot path not working, 12th January
item.description:
This street light has been reported as not working several times in the last two months and has been reported as the issue has been resolved. But these light is still not working and has been causing issues with the front of the house being very dark and making answering the front door and using the path hazardous. Please can you let me know what the resolution will be. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cowden Road, Crofton, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole on Denmark Hill bus route, near clinic, 12th January
item.description:
This pothole has been here consistently for a year, and gets worse with bus traffic. It causes nearby Grade II listed buildings to shake and is creating internal damage (numerous cracks on walls), as well as persistent disruption to residents.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 106, Denmark Hill, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No through road sign missing in esher close, 12th January
item.description:
Its been reported by number 338 hurst road that the 'no through road' sign is missing leading into esher close, the pole is there but the sign is gone. Please can this be replaced.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Esher Close, Albany Park, Greater London
